original_text: But today you have rejected your God, who saves you from all your calamities and your distresses, and you have said to him, ‘Set a king over us.’ Now therefore present yourselves before the Lord by your tribes and by your thousands.”
korean_text: 너희는 너희를 모든 재난과 고통 중에서 친히 구원하여 내신 너희의 하나님을 오늘 버리고 이르기를 우리 위에 왕을 세우라 하는도다 그런즉 이제 너희의 지파대로 천 명씩 여호와 앞에 나아오라 하고

sentences.original_text: But today you have rejected your God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 오늘 너희는 너희의 하나님을 버렸다

sentences.original_text: who saves you from all your calamities and your distresses
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 너희를 모든 재앙과 고통에서 구원하시는 분이시다

sentences.original_text: and you have said to him
Now therefore present yourselves before the Lord
by your tribes and by your thousands.
